## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad> cache option if you wish to close the `bitmapStream` after the decoder is created. The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand> cache option retains access to the stream until the bitmap is needed and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector.
